list_translation_mean.translate_mean: số hàng hóa đem ra bán

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the quality of a sound governed by the rate of vibrations producing it; the degree of highness or lowness of a tone.
the steepness of a slope, especially of a roof.
the level of intensity of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he brought the machine to a high pitch of development
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã mang máy đến một cường độ cao của sự phát triển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a legal delivery of the ball by the pitcher.
a form of words used when trying to persuade someone to buy or accept something.
a swaying or oscillation of a ship, aircraft, or vehicle around a horizontal axis perpendicular to the direction of motion.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pitch and roll of the ship

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the distance between successive corresponding points or lines, e.g., between the teeth of a cogwheel.
a sticky resinous black or dark brown substance that is semiliquid when hot, hard when cold. It is obtained by distilling tar or petroleum and is used for waterproofing.
throw (the ball) for the batter to try to hit.
throw or fling roughly or casually.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he crumpled the page up and pitched it into the fireplace
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta vò nát trang lên và ném nó vào lò sưởi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: set (one's voice or a piece of music) at a particular pitch.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you've pitched the melody very high
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn đã ném giai điệu rất cao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a bid to obtain a contract or other business.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were pitching for an account
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã ném cho một tài khoản

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: set up and fix in a definite position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we pitched camp for the night
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi ném trại cho đêm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a moving ship, aircraft, or vehicle) rock or oscillate around a lateral axis, so that the front and back move up and down.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the little steamer pressed on, pitching gently
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy hấp nhỏ ép, ném nhẹ nhàng.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (a roof) to slope downward from the ridge.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the roof was pitched at an angle of 75 degrees
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mái nhà đã được ném ở một góc 75 độ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover, coat, or smear with pitch.
